sentences.en: A casual ( or cursory ) inspection failed to reveal the house's structural flaws.
sentences.cn: 随便的 ( 匆忙的 ) 检查不能发现这所房屋的结构缺陷.

sentences.en: Because be loved, proud Lin Lan cannot bear the grievance after be being misunderstood, cursory under put forward to part company.
sentences.cn: 因为被爱，骄傲的林岚不能忍受被误解后的委屈，草率之下提出分手。

sentences.en: Burke cast a cursory glance at the menu, then flapped it shut.
sentences.cn: 伯克匆匆地瞥了一眼菜单，然后啪地合上了。

sentences.en: Even a cursory reading of the letter showed many errors.
sentences.cn: 仅草草一读,便发现那封信有许多错误.

sentences.en: He had given the report a cursory reading.
sentences.cn: 他草草看了一遍这份报告.

sentences.en: He put aside the papers after a cursory study.
sentences.cn: 他把文件稍一过目就放到一边了.

sentences.en: He signed with only a cursory glance at the report.
sentences.cn: 他只草草看了一眼报告就签了名.

sentences.en: I gave the letter a fairly cursory reading.
sentences.cn: 我大略地读了一下那封信。

sentences.en: Mason was terribly crushed. The most cursory examination revealed it.
sentences.cn: 麦森给压得很惨.即使马马虎虎地瞧一眼也看得出.

sentences.en: My hands were full, so I just gave the book a cursory reading.
sentences.cn: 我忙得不可开交, 所以只把这本书大略看了一下.

sentences.en: Nothing valuable can be obtained through cursory research.
sentences.cn: 粗泛的研究得不出什么有价值的成果.

sentences.en: Only cursory surveys have been made.
She gave a cursory greeting to Mr. Giovaneui.
sentences.cn: 她对乔瓦耐里爱理不理地招呼了一下.

sentences.en: Some books are for intensive study and some are for cursory reading.
sentences.cn: 有的书必须精读,有的只要稍加涉猎即可.

sentences.en: The only industry mentioned is agriculture and it is discussed in a cursory sentence.
sentences.cn: 实业方面只谈到农业,而且只是匆匆带了一句.

sentences.en: This time she was cursory because she felt guilty.
sentences.cn: 这一次她只是轻描淡写地说上几句,因为她感到很内疚.

words.tran_cn: 简略的；简要的；草率的；简单粗暴的

trans.tran_cn: 粗略的，草率的，仓促的，肤皮潦草
trans.tran_en: done very quickly without much attention to details
